org.mcavallo.opencloud.util
Class XMLFile

java.lang.Object
  org.mcavallo.opencloud.util.XMLFile

public class XMLFile
extends java.lang.Object

Class for reading local or remote an XML file, InputStream or DOM. The content is accessed using the XPath syntax.

getNode

public org.w3c.dom.Node getNode(java.lang.String xpathExpression)
                         throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
Read the DOM node specified by the given XPath expression. If a root node as been set, the expression is relative to the root node.

Parameters:
xpathExpression - XPath expression of the wanted node
Returns:
The resulting node
Throws:
javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

Parameters:

Returns:
The resulting node
